races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most common and diverse race, known for their ambition and adaptability.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are graceful and long-lived, with strong connections to nature and magic.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Dwarves are hardy and proud, often living in mountains and crafting strong weapons and armor.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Halflings are small and cheerful, with strong luck and quick reflexes.

races.name: Orc
races.description: Orcs are fierce warriors with great strength and a bold presence.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Tieflings are born with infernal blood, giving them supernatural abilities and a mysterious aura.
